KnowledgeBase.Title: Example String stringCiLE 001
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: compare string equal boolean case-insensitive lesser

Example.Description: These examples use the stringCiLE function to see if the first String is lesser than or equal to the second String. The Boolean value, true or false is returned. In these examples, a case-insensitive comparison is done with the Strings.

Syntax.Note: The ASCII numeric code for "G" is lesser than the ASCII numeric code for "H".
